none: Copy probably made in the Accademia dei Lincei of an earlier copy held by della Porta. Fra Paolo Sarpi might have provided the original this copy is based on. Sarpi copied from Leonardo Garzoni's Trattati.

en: Provided by Bibliotheca Hertziana – Max Planck Institute for Art History, Rome.
Bibliotheca Hertziana – Max Planck Institute for Art History
